flawed_nl_solution:
After losing one of the pages you have 12 - 1 = <<12-1=15>>15 pages of stickers.
If each page has 20 stickers on it, you have 15 x 20 = <<15*20=300>>300 stickers.
#### 300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
